attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government has bailed out the Northern Rock, the Banks twice, now the Car Industry some of these are foreign owned. The very small amount required to save investors in the Presbyterian Mutual Society (most of whom are pensioners) is less than the collective bonuses COEs and Directors of the Banks are presently being payed. Mr Brown should show some Christian Charity in this case.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
